verses.roman:
tvaṣṭā ṛcīka-tanayaḥ
kambalaś ca tilottamā
brahmāpeto 'tha satajid
dhṛtarāṣṭra iṣam-bharāḥ

synonyms: tvaṣṭā—Tvaṣṭā; ṛcīka-tanayaḥ—the son of Ṛcīka (Jamadagni); kambalaḥ—Kambala; ca—and; tilottamā—Tilottamā; brahmāpetaḥ—Brahmāpeta; atha—and; śatajit—Śatajit; dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ—Dhṛtarāṣṭra; iṣam-bharāḥ—the maintainers of the month Iṣa (Āśvina).
translation: Tvaṣṭā as the sun-god; Jamadagni, the son of Ṛcīka, as the sage; Kambalāśva as the Nāga; Tilottamā as the Apsarā; Brahmāpeta as the Rākṣasa; Śatajit as the Yakṣa; and Dhṛtarāṣṭra as the Gandharva maintain the month of Iṣa.
